title._content: View of the Solovetskii Monastery from land. [Solovetski Islands] (LOC)

description._content: To Make Your Own Color Photo from the Original Glass Plate Negative, use this file: www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/prok.00344/ Prokudin-Gorskiĭ, Sergeĭ Mikhaĭlovich, 1863-1944, photographer. View of the Solovetskii Monastery from land. [Solovetski Islands] [1915] 1 negative (3 frames) : glass, b&w, three-color separation ; 24 x 9 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Sergei Mikhailovich Prokudin-Gorskii Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Solovet͡skiĭ monastyrʹ. Monasteries. Russia (Federation)--Solovetski Islands. Format: Glass negatives. Color separation negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. For additional information on commercial use, see "Prokudin-Gorskii...," lcweb.loc.gov/rr/print/res/237_prok.html Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/prokc.20344 Call Number: LC-P87- 2156
